title: Lighters | BIC - BIC
snippet: BIC lighters are not just for lighting candles or grills; they are versatile tools for many situations. Use them to light up a cozy campfire on a chilly night or for celebrating to safely ignite fireworks during celebrations.

title: Design My BICÂ® Lighters, Set of 6 Personalized Lighters
snippet: With BIC, you can design your own lighters by uploading photos, choosing backgrounds, and adding text and clip art. It's a fun and unique way to express yourself.

title: BIC Velocity Retractable Ballpoint Pens, Medium Point (1.0 mm), Black ...
snippet: The trusted original with a classic look and feel, BIC Velocity Retractable Ball Pens offer fluid, effortless writing for everyday writing tasks. The Velocity is BIC's #1 selling retractable ball pen and comes filled with ink that writes even smoother than BIC classic ink system.
